name: Deadly Ocean
description:
How to play? Your player is the crab. The objective of the game is to discard all of your cards. There are four types of cards: Pollution cards which add pollution when played. Cleaning cards which remove pollution when played. Special cards (reverse and skip) must be played on a card of the same color. Flora and Fauna cards which don't do anything but if you play them while there is pollution you will draw cards equal to the amount of pollution. The first player to successfully get rid of all their cards wins. Controls:
  • Left click to drag and drop a card.
  • Press right click to inspect the card.
  • Press "ESC" or click anywhere to close inspect mode.
